title: Losing faith :(
body: I keep getting to my promotion matches for gold but every time i get to them i end up going 3/0 and back to silver 1 x.x .. i think it's time i just give up :(

replies.body:
haha. ive on two week suspension until friday 07.11
but add me. i will carry you out of silver.
dont do it he will get you banned too
your only gold anyway lol nothing to good. Also enjoy the loss of ranked rewards :P
this is the internet where grammar doesnt mean shit, grammar nazi like you are the problem with the world. do us a favor and just dissapear

disappear
favour (we use the macquarie dictionary in australia)

yes, that grammar epidemic...
it's okay this guy is just toxic all around, don't waste you're energy on him, it passes right over him
I appreciate the offer but in all honesty if i don't do it myself ill kind of feel like im cheating myself :x if i dont make it to gold this year then theres always next year.
lol just keep at it you can make it
